about: A reimplementation of the default CKAN dataset schema for PFR

dataset_fields.label: Title

dataset_fields.label: Description
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: A free form description of the data

dataset_fields.label: Tags
dataset_fields.help_text: What information you think will be useful to help you or others search for your data? Think about what your future self might want to search for, or what would you want to search for in work that you did five years ago. What was the question, study species/system/crop, key effects, methods used, specific machine, site, key methodology..., anything else?

dataset_fields.label: License
dataset_fields.help_text: License definitions and additional information can be found at http://opendefinition.org/

dataset_fields.label: Organization
dataset_fields.help_text: Visibility sets whether this metadata record is shown outside of this organisation

dataset_fields.label: Project Code
dataset_fields.help_text: the project code under which the data was initially collected. If it is unofficial exploratory work this can be left blank

dataset_fields.label: Project leader (author)
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: name or comma separated list of names

dataset_fields.label: Data Custodian
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Person responsible for managing and archiving the data

dataset_fields.label: Credits
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: Who should be acknowledged for collecting the data
